sections.title: 1. Privacy at a Glance
sections.content: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you.

sections.title: 2. General Information and Mandatory Information
sections.content: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.

sections.title: 3. Data Collection on This Website
sections.content: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the legal notice of this website.

sections.title: 4. Contact Form
sections.content: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details from the inquiry form, including the contact details you provided there, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. We will not share this data without your consent.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient and purpose of your stored personal data free of charge at any time. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data.
